name: Robot Story - Another Lost Odd-Planet Monster Hive (Future World Indie Game)
name_original: Robot Story - Another Lost Odd-Planet Monster Hive (Future World Indie Game)
description:
*BEEP* ... *BEEP* *BEEP*

.....

0111001110

....

Robot Story begins:

Every robot is only modern for so long. Once outdated they are deactivated and put away, merely waiting to be broken apart and having whatever useful parts reused in new robots. This is the story of an old robot trying to escape its destiny. This is the Robot Story.
